item.title: John M. Chambers Award, Product Sense, and the Feature Roadmap for liftr
item.description: I feel super honored to say that I have received the 2018 John M. Chambers Statistical Software Award from the American Statistical Association this year, for my R package liftr on reproducible research. This year’s award also has another recipient: Dustin Tran, for his excellent Python library Edward on probabilistic programming. We just had a great session of invited talks today at the 2018 Joint Statistical Meetings in Vancouver, Canada.
